import React from "react"; import { Container, Navbar } from "react-bootstrap"; import ShapeAnalyzer from "./components/ShapeAnalyzer"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css"; import "./App.css"; function App() { return (
SHAPE - Shape & Color Analysis Tool

Shape & Color Analyzer

Upload an image to analyze shapes and colors. The tool can measure dimensions and identify colors of objects in your images.

© {new Date().getFullYear()} SHAPE Detector | Powered by OpenCV and Machine Learning

); } export default App;
